content.prompt: The implementation of the policies of extermination shown in the image is most directly explained by which of the following aspects of Nazi ideology?

choices.label: The idea that Germans descended from a master “Aryan” race
The idea that some minority populations could eventually be Germanized
The idea that minority populations within Germany were somehow responsible for its defeat during the First World War
The idea that Germany needed to expand its postwar borders in order to provide “living space” for its people

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
